sense.def: AN jing bu si 驚怖死 ; xia si 嚇死 , [appearance of] death from intimidation. Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death, resulting from an unforeseen and violent experience of fright/shock. Qi xiao liang fang 奇效良方 69 Recipe Entry zhu du tong zhi fang 諸毒 通治方 , recipe to cure all types of poison: 驚死、鬼迷死 , 未隔宿者 , 並冷水磨 灌下 , “For [appearance of] death from fright/shock and [appearance of] death from demonic enchantment that have not lasted overnight yet, grind together with cold water and forcibly instill into [the patient]”.
